trans-unit.source: Specifies permission to request information from Domain Name Servers.
trans-unit.target: Angir tillatelse til å be om informasjon fra DNS-servere.

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by DnsPermissionAttribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which the DnsPermissionAttribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjonen deklarert av DnsPermissionAttribute er lagret i metadataene for attributtet, som er klassen som DnsPermissionAttribute brukes.

trans-unit.source: The system then accesses this information at run time.
trans-unit.target: Systemet har deretter tilgang til denne informasjonen på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is passed to the constructor determines the allowable DNS targets.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>som er sendt til konstruktøren bestemmer tillatte DNS-målene.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: These security attributes are used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8).
trans-unit.target: Disse sikkerhetsattributtene brukes bare for [deklarerende sikkerhet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8).

trans-unit.source: For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: For [forutsetning sikkerhet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), bruker du den tilsvarende <xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>klasse.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermission>

trans-unit.source: Security access is either fully restricted or fully unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerheten for tilgang er begrenset fullstendig eller fullstendig ubegrenset.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> property to `true` to grant access, or `false` for no access.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>egenskapen `true` å gi tilgang, eller `false` for Ingen tilgang.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Set this property as a named parameter.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen som en navngitt parameter.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> value that is passed to this constructor specifies the allowable <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute> targets.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>verdien som er sendt til denne konstruktøren angir den maksimale <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute>mål.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The action parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: Den action parameteren er ikke en gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The `CreatePermission` method is called by the security system, not by application code.
trans-unit.target: Den `CreatePermission` metoden kalles av sikkerhetssystemer, ikke av en kode for programmet.

trans-unit.source: The security information described by <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute> is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjon som er beskrevet i <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute>er lagret i metadataene for attributtet, som er klassen som <xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute>brukes.</xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute> </xref:System.Net.DnsPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The system then accesses the information at run time and calls CreatePermission.
trans-unit.target: Systemet har tilgang til informasjonen på kjøretidspunktet deretter og kaller CreatePermission.

trans-unit.source: The system uses the returned <xref:System.Security.IPermission> to enforce the specified security requirements.
trans-unit.target: Systemet bruker det returnerte <xref:System.Security.IPermission>implementere de angitte sikkerhetskravene.</xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> that corresponds to the security declaration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"> </xref> som tilsvarer security-deklarering.
